formatted_address: 290 Orchard Road, #16-01/02 Paragon Medical Tower 1 via Lift Lobby F, Singapore 238859
name: LSC Eye Clinic (previously The Lasik Surgery Clinic) by SMG

reviews.text:
I did ZEISS SMILE at LSC Eye Clinic last year with Dr. Daphne Han. She was incredibly patient in addressing all my concerns about the surgery and during my post-surgery follow-ups. Her team was friendly and professional, and they made sure to clean the equipment after each use.

Choosing to undergo this surgery was one of the best decisions Iâ€™ve made.

I underwent eye surgery at LSC Eye Clinic, where the entire staff exhibited exceptional care. Their genuine passion and professionalism were evident, creating a comforting atmosphere both before and after the surgery. Dr. Han, in particular, stands out as one of the best doctors I've encountered, demonstrating a sincere concern for the well-being of her patients. This clinic was recommended by my partner and future in-laws. They had been their loyal customers since the clinic's opening, and I am genuinely grateful for following their advice.

Had my lasik procedure done and overall a pleasant experience here. It was my first eye surgery but Dr Han was very experienced and reassuring, and she was supported by a team of administrative and clinical staff who were very friendly and attentive.

Made appointment for eye testing and the stuff conducted the test after registration, less waiting time. Whole testing processes are smooth with nice and clean equipment. Dr Daphne is professional and use Chinese to explain the test results to me since I am not so familiar with those eye related English words.
Very nice experience here.

Thank you LSC clinic & team for my successful Lasik experience. The staff here are very patient and helpful! Kit always have a big smile on her face when I speak to her. Kat was very reassuring. I don't know everyone's names, but I was very well taken care of. During my surgery, Dr. Daphne was very encouraging and motivating with her kind words. Thank you for making my Lasik surgery so seamless!

vicinity: 290 Orchard Road, #16-01/02 Paragon Medical Tower 1 via Lift Lobby F
